entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
